title: Papa, Maman, La Bonne Et Moi (1954)
description:
Avec Nicole COURCEL, Louis DE FUNES, Robert LAMOUREUX, Fernand LEDOUX, Judith MAGRE, Gaby MORLAY, Robert ROLLIS, Jean TISSIER 

Robert Langlois, stagiaire chez un avocat, perd sa place. Vivant chez ses parents il ne leur parle pas de sa situation et, pour vivre, donne des leÃƒÂ§ons particuliÃƒÂ¨res. Il rencontre une jeune fille, Catherine, dont il tombe amoureux. Cette derniÃƒÂ¨re ÃƒÂ©lÃƒÂ¨ve une petite fille Ã¢â‚¬â€œ l'enfant de sa sÃ…â€œur morte en couches. Tant qu'il ne peut faire face aux problÃƒÂ¨mes de son futur mÃƒÂ©nage, Robert parvient ÃƒÂ  faire engager Catherine comme bonne chez ses parents. Peu ÃƒÂ  peu, Catherine s'intÃƒÂ¨gre chez les Langlois. Robert peut alors dÃƒÂ©clarer qu'il aime Catherine et l'ÃƒÂ©pouser. 

(A popular attraction in French cinemas, Papa, Maman la Bonne et Moi (Papa, Mama the Maid and I) later became equally popular on the Late-TV-Movie circuit in America. The hero, Robert (Robert Lamoureux) is fired for making a pass at one of the girls in his office. It wasn't his freshness that got him canned, but his clumsiness with the opposite sex. Normally, Robert would go to his parents (Fernand Ledoux and Gaby Morlay) for advice, but this is a more delicate situation. To learn more about "l'amour", Robert hires a lovely young girl (Madeline Barbulee) whom he passes off as his maid.)
